## AvatarAnimationDataSource type

[mixamo](https://www.mixamo.com/) animation file URLs

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AvatarAnimationDataSource = {
    walk: string;
    idle: string;
    [key: string]: string;
};
```

## Example


```ts
const ANIMATION_MAP = {
  idle: "asset/animation/idle.fbx",
  walk: "asset/animation/walk.fbx",
  dance: "asset/animation/dance.fbx",
};
```
